text2: We successfully cope with tasks of varying complexity, provide long-term guarantees and regularly master new technologies. Our portfolio includes dozens of successfully completed projects of houses of different storeys, with highâ€“quality finishes and good repairs. Building houses is our vocation!
text: Ivy Earthworks is locally owned by a skilled tradesman who started out helping his neighbors before demand spread to the greater Cleveland area. Whether you are looking for excavation, renovation, trenching, drainage, grading, or even dumpsters, we are here to work you.
name: James Modarelli
